javadoc:
A class to handle locating, opening and caching (within a JVM) programs in the test
 environment.  (This code was formerly inside of TestEnv.)

methods.name: getProgram
methods.comment:
Open a read-only test program from the test data directory.
 This program must be released prior to disposing this test environment.
 NOTE: Some tests rely on this method returning null when file does
 not yet exist within the resource area (e.g., test binaries for P-Code Tests)

params.name: progName
params.comment: name of program database within the test data directory.

return.comment: program or null if program file not found

methods.name: saveToCache
methods.comment:
Save a program to the cached program store.  A SaveAs will be performed on the
 program to its cached storage location.

params.name: replace
params.comment: if true any existing cached database with the same name will be replaced

methods.name: isProgramCached
methods.comment: Determine if the specified program already exists with the program cache

return.comment: true if the specified program already exists with the program cache

methods.javadoc:
Remove specified program from cache
@param name the program name
methods.name: removeFromProgramCache
addProgramToProject
methods.comment:
Copies the specified program zip file to the JUnit test project's root folder. This
 means that the program will appear in the FrontEndTool as part of the project.  That is
 the only reason to use this method vice openProgram().

params.name: project
params.comment: the project into which the file will be restored

params.name: programName
params.comment: the name of the program zip file without the ".gzf" extension.

methods.name: addProgramToProject
methods.comment:
Copies the specified program zip file to the JUnit test project's folder. This
 means that the program will appear in the FrontEndTool as part of the project.  That is
 the only reason to use this method vice openProgram().

params.name: folder
params.comment: the folder into which the domain file will be inserted

params.name: programName
params.comment: the name of the program zip file without the ".gzf" extension.

name: TestProgramManager
comment:
A class to handle locating, opening and caching (within a JVM) programs in the test
 environment.  (This code was formerly inside of TestEnv.)
